slide.title: Full-Stack Developer
slide.description: Over {years} years building professional and unique projects, bringing ideas to life. From stunning interfaces to complex business logic.

slide.title: Website Instructor
slide.description: Mastering high-quality technologies to architect scalable, responsive, and high-performance software systems.

slide.title: Captured and written stories
slide.description: My artistic passions—photography and writing—unveil nature’s unseen beauty, where I meticulously balance technical with artistic expression.

who_i_am.title: Who I am?
description: With ~{years} years of experience building scalable, maintainable, and user-centric web applications, I focus on delivering functional solutions that provide mutual benefits for both clients and users.

I excel at adapting quickly to new challenges to create efficient and impactful web solutions. I'm also a lifelong student of technology, driven by a deep passion for continuous learning and staying ahead of the latest industry trends. More about me.

contents.title: Mentor & Educator
contents.content: I had the privilege of serving as an instructor for a web development diploma program. I was responsible for guiding the next generation of developers, sharing my expertise in the JavaScript ecosystem and core web technologies, such as HTML, CSS, NodeJS, MySQL, and even more.

contents.title: Dedicated to Excellence
contents.content: I don't settle for 'good enough'; instead, I strive to constantly improve my skills and push the boundaries of every project.

contents.title: Beyond Certification
contents.content: My education truly accelerated when I went beyond theoretical knowledge and delved into the realm of practical creation.

projects.title: Push Hands Dashboard
projects.description: Designed and developed a user dashboard for the 'My Passion Index' project. The platform allows users to handle events, organizations, and blog content, optimizing data interaction and administration.

projects.title: Bingo Papaya Board
projects.description: Digital bingo board for real-time game projection. The platform displays the most recent draws and winning patterns. The application automates the process, ensuring a smooth and engaging gaming experience.

projects.title: Academia Valentina App
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive mobile application for managing baking and cooking courses. The app includes features for courses purchase, and take a survey to get the certificate, enhancing operational efficiency and user experience, including admin and teacher panel for content and courses management.

projects.title: MAVET Posts
projects.description: Developed a public-facing platform for the 'Museo de Artes Visuales y del Espacio del Táchira' (MAVET). This robust system handles the management and public display of art collections, events, courses, and educational content.

details: Managed client requirements, ensuring project satisfaction and timely delivery.
Led the implementation of homologation for three key clients and businesses, upgrading the accounting software to optimize their processes.
Creation and development of a back-office platform for a Unified Threat Management (UTM) system.
Seamless data migration between websites, ensuring data integrity and full service availability.
Developed and launched an online sales platform, resulting in a 30% increase in website traffic.
Instructed two cohorts in the web development diploma program, covering intermediate and advanced levels.

contact_to_me.title: Contact Me
contact_to_me.description: If you have a project in mind, a business that needs a stronger online presence, or just want to discuss how technology can help you achieve your goals, feel free to reach out. I look forward to hearing from you. Select one of this contact options, and as soon as i'm available, will connect your idea and needs to a reality!

consult_details.label: Consult details
consult_details.placeholder: Something like: I need a website for my new business that sells eco-friendly products...
